description: With his band now on hiatus, the 24-year-old pop star is focused on fatherhood and is making Briana, 23, and his unborn child his priority.
title: Louis Tomlinson moves to Los Angeles to support pregnant Briana Jungwirth
title_page: Louis Tomlinson moves to Los Angeles to support pregnant Briana Jungwirth | Daily Mail Online
text:
Louis Tomlinson is leaving the UK to move to Los Angeles as he prepares to become a first-time father.
The One Direction singer is relocating to California this week to be close to Briana Jungwirth, who is due to give birth to their baby later this month.
With his band now on hiatus, the 24-year-old pop star is focused on fatherhood and is making Briana, 23, and his unborn child his priority.
See the latest One Direction updates on Louis Tomlinson as he moves to LA
Parenthood is coming: Louis Tomlinson and Briana Jungwirth, pictured in May 2015, are preparing to become first-time parents later this month
A friend of Louis told the MailOnline that singer is planning to be a hands-on dad and support Briana in any way he can.
The pal said: 'Although they're not romantically involved, Louis thinks Briana is a great woman and will be a fabulous mother.
'Louis has been helping Briana financially and is prepared to get stuck in with all the tasks that caring for a baby demands.'
The Doncaster-raised star's LA move also means he will be close to his new girlfriend Danielle Campbell, who stars in The Vampire Diaries spin-off The Originals.
On hiatus: Louis is now enjoying some time out from One Direction, which means he will have more time to spend with Briana and the baby
The pair have been spotted in Chicago, London and France in recent weeks, although it's still very early days, according to friends.
LA-native Briana's pregnancy was revealed last July after the pair had a brief fling in May following the end of Louis's four year romance with Eleanor Calder.
Soon after, Louis splashed out on a lavish home in a gated community for Briana and the baby.
While the pair weren't in a relationship, Louis vowed to support Briana and described her as a great friend.
In August, he confirmed he was set to become a father on Good Morning America, enthusing: 'Obviously it's a very exciting time, so I'm buzzing.'
New romance: Louis was spotted kissing new girlfriend Danielle Campbell in a bar in Val D'Isere in France last week on fans' Twitter accounts
1D's mentor Simon Cowell admitted he told Louis to 'man up' after discovering the pregnancy, telling the young singer: 'You're fortunate because you're in a position to be able to look after the baby and not worry about too much else.'
Following the pregnancy revelation, Louis's mother Johannah Deakin flew to LA to meet the expectant Briana.
Mother-of-seven Johannah has been a great support to Briana and they were spotted Christmas shopping together last month.
A source told the MailOnline that the midwife and her husband Dan - Louis's stepfather - are planning to join their son in Los Angeles following the birth to meet their grandchild and offer support.
Louis's move to the US comes after he enjoyed a winter break in the Alps after inviting former Disney star Danielle, 20, to spend New Year's Eve with him in London.
